title: Set home page as default route

requirements.summary: Configure routing to display home page as the default route instead of project page
acceptanceCriteria: Opening the application root URL displays the home page
The project page remains accessible via its specific route

file_operations.description: Update the routing configuration to set the home page as the default route at '/'. Change the current default route from the project page to the home page, and ensure the project page is accessible via its own specific route path (e.g., '/project' or '/projects'). Verify that all navigation links and route definitions are consistent with the new routing structure.
